====Ctrl-Win-Alt-Space====
Ctrl-Win-Alt-Space shows [ConEmuTerms#RealConsole real console window].

On some systems (Vista, i.e.) You must press Space twice.

====Buffer scrolling====
Ctrl-Up, Ctrl-Down, Ctrl-!PgUp, Ctrl-!PgDn

====System menu====
Win-Alt-Space pops up !ConEmu [SystemMenu system menu].

====Settings dialog====
Win-Alt-P opens [Settings Settings dialog].

====!FullScreen mode====
Ctrl-Win-Enter maximize !ConEmu window and hide window caption.

====Tabs switching====
Ctrl-Tab and Ctrl-Shift-Tab

In lazy switching mode (tab bar must be visible) window will not be really switched, until Ctrl is released.

When lazy tab switching was started in recent mode, You may use Left and Right keys to select tabs directly.

====Configurable hotkeys====
|| *Multiconsole* || ||
|| Win-W || Create new console tab. [Screenshots#Confirmation_of_new_console_creation_(Win-W) Confirmation dialog] will be displayed, when «[Settings#Tabs Create confirmation]» setting is enabled. *W* is default, [Settings#Tabs configurable]. ||
|| Win-Shift-W || Create new console tab with [Screenshots#Confirmation_of_new_console_creation_(Win-W) confirmation dialog], regardless of «[Settings#Tabs Create confirmation]» setting. *W* is default, [Settings#Tabs configurable]. ||
|| [Screenshots#Confirmation_of_restarting_console_(Win-%7E) Win-~] || Restart current console, all applications running in the current console will be terminated. *~* is default, [Settings#Tabs configurable]. ||
|| Win-Q, Win-Shift-Q || Activate next/previous console tab. *Q* is default, [Settings#Tabs configurable]. ||
|| Win-Del || Terminate current console. This hotkey is *disabled* by default! You may enable it in the [Settings#Manual_change_of_settings !ConEmu Settings] ||
|| Win-A || *Ignored in Windows 7*. Turns [ConEmuTerms#BufferHeight BufferHeight] mode on/off. *A* is default. ||
|| Win-1, ..., Win-9, Win-0, Win-F11, Win-F12 || Select console by number (1 throw 12) ||
|| *Minimize/Restore* || ||
|| Win-C || Minimize or Restore !ConEmu window. *C* is default, [Settings#Manual_change_of_settings configurable]. ||
|| Win-X || Create new console tab with `cmd.exe`. *X* is default, [Settings#Manual_change_of_settings configurable]. ||
=====Host key=====
Note, *Win* is default «[ConEmuTerms#Host_key Host key]», keys combination is [Settings#Tabs configurable].
